definition.value: from ncAlertStream select 'nerveCenterAlert' as name, 'network' as namespace, UUID() as docId, timestamp, 'TestJoin' as alertKey, '' as parentKey, dims_component, dims_pod, dims_bubble, dims_entity, dims_dc, severity, severityCode, componentType, entityType, source, message, key, linkedSwitch, linkedSwitchType, localPort, pod, 'nerveCenter' as alertSource, ip, linkedPort, bubble, state, entity, status, dc, 0l as count, 0l as firstOccurrenceTime, 'ncAlertOutputStream' as streamName, monitor, cause, timestamp as lastModifiedTime insert into ncAlertOutputStream;
